version_description:
We’ve been busy since the last release adding features, bug fixing, and improving app performance. Below are the key updates in this version of the app.

• Interactive push notifications – this is a big new feature update. We have now added the ability to receive interactive push notifications, giving you an audible voice warning of an alarm activation from your panel.
• We’ve given you the ability to have 8 cameras in your app now instead of 4
• We’ve updated some translations in Russian and Italian
• Before, the app didn’t allow your iOS device to sleep if left on the app start page – we’ve fixed this now
• We’ve improved app startup time so you can get into your system or cameras quicker
• We’ve improved performance on iOS

We value your opinions. Get in touch using apps@pyronix.com if you have any suggestions on performance improvements, feature updates or would just like to give some feedback.

Added German,Czech and Slovak language support
iOS Settings app now shows correct app version
Updated camera UI

1. Updated app with new certificates
2. Updated Italian translations
General release to include updated Privacy Policy
Update to the Privacy Policy and minor enhancements
Update to address challenges with some notification types
